channel.title: [31]*Help*Making EVERYWHERE except banks PVP*HELP*[317]
channel.description:
alright so here is some backround in info:
Client = FuberGen 317 Project v. 8.0 client. Source = DDS speced Source v3.
=========== Making everywhere PVP ===========
the first thing i tried, was going into client.java and searching 'safezone' and deleteing them all..cept i didn't get any search results when i did it so..i was wondering if anybody had anyideas on how to make this happen :) help is 100% appreciated, the faster i can get this done, the faster i can release my newest work :) all help is welcome, if you can help me with this or anything else, add my MSN Drew1sgod@hotmail.com, if not just please post if you know. thanks :)

item.title: [31]*Help*Making EVERYWHERE except banks PVP*HELP*[317]
item.dc:creator: @ModAssassin ModAssassin
item.description:
@ModAssassin wrote:

Jc22493:

No, type one specifies a 1v1 zone. Type two specifies a multi zone. Just change everything to ‘absX >= 0 && absX <= 9999 && absY >= 0 && absY <= 9999’.

like this?

public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {
	if (Type == 1) {
		if ((coordY >= 0) && (coordY <= 9999) && (coordX <= 0)
				&& (coordX >= 9999) || absX >= 0 && absX <= 9999 && absY >= 0 && absY <=9999 || absX >= 0 && absX <= 9999 && absY >= 0 && absY <=9999 || absX >= 0 && absX <= 9999 && absY >= 0 && absY <=9999) {
			return true;
		}
	} else if (Type == 2) {
		if ((coordY >= 0) && (coordY <= 9999) && (coordX <= 0)
				&& (coordX >= 9999)) {
			return true;
		}
	}

Read full topic

item.title: [31]*Help*Making EVERYWHERE except banks PVP*HELP*[317]
item.dc:creator: @ModAssassin ModAssassin
item.description:
@ModAssassin wrote:

[quote=“zerogordo, post:2, topic:285674”]considering this is dds spec or whatever it would be in the player.java the code should be be:

                public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {
		if (Type == 1) {
			if (absX >= 2699 && absX <= 2753 && absY >= 9098 && absY <=9132 || (coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
					&& (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 2377 && absX <= 2429 && absY >= 3070 && absY <=3143|| absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && absY >= 4676 && absY <=4715) {
				return true;
			}
		} else if (Type == 2) {
			if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
					&& (coordX >= 2942)) {
				return true;
			}
		}

as you probably know type2 = safe type1 = wild

Hope that helped if you have any other questions ill try answer them my best[/quote]

so if i just delete all the type2’s, everywhere wud be pvp :p?

Read full topic

item.title: [31]*Help*Making EVERYWHERE except banks PVP*HELP*[317]
item.dc:creator: @zerogordo zerogordo
item.description:
@zerogordo wrote:

considering this is dds spec or whatever it would be in the player.java the code should be be:

                public boolean isInWilderness(int coordX, int coordY, int Type) {
		if (Type == 1) {
			if (absX >= 2699 && absX <= 2753 && absY >= 9098 && absY <=9132 || (coordY >= 3523) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
					&& (coordX >= 2942) || absX >= 2377 && absX <= 2429 && absY >= 3070 && absY <=3143|| absX >= 3220 && absX <= 3299 && absY >= 3520 && absY <=3548 || absX >= 2250 && absX <= 2296 && absY >= 4676 && absY <=4715) {
				return true;
			}
		} else if (Type == 2) {
			if ((coordY >= 3512) && (coordY <= 3967) && (coordX <= 3392)
					&& (coordX >= 2942)) {
				return true;
			}
		}

as you probably know type2 = safe type1 = wild

Hope that helped if you have any other questions ill try answer them my best

Read full topic
